best_gem_comment: This class is a gem from the standpoint that it has little work week–to–week but that doesn't mean it is easy to succeed. The class doesn't set you up for success because a lot of the lectures are so incredibly dry that it is hard to pay attention and the assignments are poorly written.
best_gem_comment_short: This class is a gem from the standpoint that it has little work week–to–week but that doesn't mean it is easy to succeed.

best_gem_comment: Money Matters is a course that truly deepened my understanding of numismatics by utilizing coins and artifacts as vehicles to understand history, socio–economic practices, and art. I recommend all students take this course!! Definitely a gem!!! The professor (Professor Georganteli is the sweetest!!!!!!) and teaching staff are amazing! What other class lets you handle/hold artifacts, particularly coins, from thousands of years ago? If you have any interest in exploring the philosophy of economic/monetary systems, coin designs, the value of money from coins to NFTs, or anything that has to do with money, take this course!!!
